# init(coder:)

**Initializer**

Initializes and returns an image object from data in an unarchiver.

## Declaration

```swift
init(coder: NSCoder)
```

## Creating Images from Existing Data

- **init(data:)**: Initializes and returns an image object using the provided image data.
- **init(dataIgnoringOrientation:)**: Initializes and returns an image object using the provided image data and ignoring the EXIF orientation tags.
- **init(cgImage:size:)**: Creates a new image using the contents of the provided image.
- **init(pasteboard:)**: Initializes and returns an image object with data from the specified pasteboard.
